sen.j: 天津飯（てんしんはん）は、日本生まれの中華料理。
sen.e: Tenshin-han is a Chinese-style dish originated in Japan.
Tenshin-han is a Chinese-style dish originating in Japan.
Tenshin-han is a Chinese-style dish originating in Japan.

sen.j: 「天津丼（てんしんどんぶり）」、「蟹玉丼（かにたまどんぶり）」という名でも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It is also called "Tenshin-donburi" or "Kanitama-donburi."
It is also called "Tenshin-donburi" or "Kanitama-donburi."
It is also called 'Tenshin-donburi' or 'Kanitama-donburi.'

sen.j: 名前の由来
sen.e: Origin of the name
Origin of the name
Origin of the name

sen.j: 本来は、昭和の物資不足の時代に、中華人民共和国天津市産の良質米である「小站米」（シャオチャンミー）をわざわざ使った、蟹肉入り卵焼き乗せ丼という意味であり、「天津芙蓉蟹肉飯」という料理名であった。
sen.e: Originally, its name was Tianjin Fu Rong Xie (fried crab with egg white) with rice, which meant a dish served with a donburi (china bowl) containing boiled ride topped with fried egg with crab meat for which Xiaozhanmi, which is a high-quality rice produced in Tianjin City in the People's Republic of Japan, was used in the age of supply shortage in Showa era.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: Originally, during the Showa era when Japan faced supply shortages, the name came from Tianjin Fu Rong Xie (fried crab with egg white) with rice, which meant a dish served with a donburi (china bowl) containing steamed rice from Xiaozhanmi, which is a high-quality rice produced in Tianjin City in the People's Republic of China, topped with fried egg with crab meat.

Originally, during the Showa period when Japan faced supply shortages, the name came from 'Tianjin Fu Rong Xie (fried crab with egg white)' with rice, which meant a dish served using a donburi (china bowl) that contained steamed rice from 'Xiaozhanmi,' which is a high-quality rice produced in Tianjin City in the People's Republic of China, topped with fried egg with crab meat.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: しかし、間の読みづらい「芙蓉蟹肉」がいつの間にか略されて「天津飯」となったと考えられる。
sen.e: However, "Tianjin Fu Rong Xie" (fried crab with egg white), which was difficult to pronounce was somehow omitted and the name was changed to "Tenshin-han."
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: However, "Tianjin Fu Rong Xie" (fried crab with egg white), which was difficult to pronounce was somehow omitted and the name was changed to "Tenshin-han."
However, the part 'Tianjin Fu Rong Xie (fried crab with egg white),' which was difficult to pronounce was somehow omitted and the name was changed to 'Tenshin-han.'
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 小站米は現在の天津市津南区小站鎮でつくられているため、中国では「小站稻米」（シャオチャンダオミー）とも呼ばれている。
sen.e: As Xiaozhanmi is produced in Xiaozhan, Jinnan District, Tianjin, it is also called Xiaozhan daomi in China.
As Xiaozhanmi is produced in Xiaozhan, Jinnan District, Tianjin, it is also called Xiaozhan daomi in China.
As Xiaozhanmi is grown in Xiaozhan, Jinnan District, Tianjin, it is also called 'Xiaozhan daomi' in China.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 日本から持ち込まれて栽培されたジャポニカ種で、小粒で、ぱさつかず、粘りがある。
sen.e: It is Japonica-origin brought from Japan and cultivated and its grains are small and it do not taste as dried out and it is sticky.
The rice was of a Japonica type, brought and cultivated from Japan with small grains which did not have a dry taste.
The rice was of a Japonica type, brought from Japan for cultivation, and has small grains that did not have a dry taste.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 中国には、広東料理の卵料理としての「芙蓉蟹（肉）」（蟹玉）はあるが、これをご飯に載せることは通常なく、「天津飯」という名の料理も存在しない。
sen.e: In China, although there is "Fu Rong Xie (rou)" (fried crab meat with egg white) as an egg dish in Cantonese food, usually, it is not put on the top of boiled rice and there is no dish named "Tenshin-han."

In China, although there is "Fu Rong Xie (rou)" (fried crab meat with egg white) as an egg dish in Cantonese food, usually, it is not put on the top of steamed rice and there is no dish named "Tenshin-han."

In China, although there is 'Fu Rong Xie (rou) (fried crab meat with egg white)' as an egg dish in Cantonese food, it is usually not put on the top of steamed rice and there is not any dish named 'Tenshin-han.'
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 作り方
sen.e: Cooking method
Cooking method
Cooking method

sen.j: 刻みネギ、シイタケ、カニの身、塩などを加えた溶き卵を中華鍋、フライパンなどで混ぜながら焼き、深めの皿に盛ったご飯の上にのせる。
sen.e: Beaten egg mixed with chopped leeks, shiitake mushroom, crab meat and salt is stirred and heated and put it on boiled rice put on a deep dish.
Beaten eggs mixed with chopped leeks, shiitake mushroom, crab meat and salt is stirred and heated and put on steamed rice which is placed in a deep dish.
Beaten eggs mixed with chopped leeks, shiitake mushroom, crab meat, and salt are stir-fried and put on steamed rice that is placed in a deep dish.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: その上から、片栗粉でとろみを付けた、餡をかけ、あんかけにする。
sen.e: In order to make the dish ankake (a dish of food with a an thickened with powdered kudzu), an (sauce thickened with katakuriko flour) is poured on the top of them.
In order to make the dish ankake (a dish thickened with powdered kudzu), an (sauce thickened with katakuriko flour) is poured on top.
In order to serve gelee over the dish, the gelee made of starch powder is poured on the top.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: レシピ、特にあんの味付けには地域により差異があるとされるが、詳細な調査根拠は乏しい。
sen.e: It is said that there are regional difference in recipe, in particular seasoning of the an, but it lacks survey in details and grounds.
sen.cmt: 原文に不備があると思われます。補って訳しました。
sen.e: It is said that there are regional differences between recipes, especially with regards to the seasoning of the an, but detailed research on the matter is rare.
It is said that there are regional differences between recipes, especially with regards to the seasoning of the gelee, but there are few detailed research on the matter.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 関西地方を始め、東海道沿いで言えば静岡県の浜名湖以西の地域では、あんの味付けには醤油を使うため、薄茶色の仕上がりになる。
sen.e: Starting with the Kansai region and in areas from the Lake Hamana to the West along Tokaido, soy sauce is used for seasoning the color of finished an is light brown.
Starting with the Kansai region and in areas from Lake Hamana to the West along Tokaido, soy sauce is used for seasoning, and the color of finished an is light brown.
Starting with the Kansai region and in areas to the west of the Lake Hamana along the Tokaido highway, soy sauce is used for seasoning so that the color of finished gelee is light brown.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 逆に関東地方を始め、浜名湖以東の地域では酢に加えてケチャップを使うことが多く、この場合、あんの色は赤である。
sen.e: On the other hand, starting with the Kanto region and the areas from the Lake Hamana to the East, in addition to vinegar, ketchup is often used and the color of an is red.
On the other hand, starting with the Kanto region and the areas from Lake Hamana to the East, in addition to vinegar, ketchup is often used and the color of the an is red.
On the other hand, starting with the Kanto region and in the areas to the east of the Lake Hamana, in addition to vinegar, ketchup is often used so that the color of the gelee is red.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 醤油味の場合は、あんに椎茸、筍などを少量加えることも多く、彩りにエンドウマメが添えられる。
sen.e: In the case of an seasoned with soy sauce, a small amount of shiitake mushroom, bamboo shoot, etc. is often added while green peas are added for coloring.
In the case of an seasoned with soy sauce, a small amount of shiitake mushroom, bamboo shoot, etc. is often added while green peas are added for coloring.
In the case of an seasoned with soy sauce, a small amount of shiitake mushroom, bamboo shoot, etc. is often added while green peas are added for garnish.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: ご飯は短粒種の白米が普通である。
sen.e: For boiled rice, polished rice of short grain is used usually.
For steamed rice, polished short grain rice is usually used.
For steamed rice, polished short grain rice are usually used.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: チャーハンを包んだ場合はオムライスと呼ばれる中華風の洋食となる。
sen.e: If chahan (fried rice) is wrapped, Chinese-taste western dish called "omuraisu" is obtained.
If chahan (fried rice) is wrapped, a Chinese-tasting western dish called "omuraisu" can be created.
If chahan (fried rice) is wrapped in an omelet, it is a Chinese-tasting western dish called omuraisu.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: オムチャーハンは、洋食であるゆえに、具材のカニなどが省略されたり、あんかけにしなかったりするのが普通である。
sen.e: Since omuchahan is a western dish, usually crab meat as material is omitted or it is not prepared with an.
Since omuchahan is a western dish, crab meat is usually omitted or the omlette is not prepared with an.
Since omuchahan is a western dish, usually, crab meat is omitted or the sauce is not served over it.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: また、ソースを選択できる店もあり、その中に天津飯に近い甘酢あんかけがあることもある。
sen.e: In some restaurants, we can choose sauces that include sweet and sour thick sauce similar to that for Tenshin-han.
In some restaurants, sauces can be chosen that include a sweet and sour thick sauce similar to that for Tenshin-han.
In some restaurants, sauces can be chosen that include a sweet vinegar gelee similar to that for Tenshin-han.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: また、一部の中華料理店などでは、オムチャーハンに天津飯でかけるあんをそのままかけて『天津チャーハン』として出している店もある。
sen.e: Also, certain Chinese restaurants serve "Tenshin chahan" that is prepared by putting an for Tenshinm-han on the top of omuchahan.
Also, certain Chinese restaurants serve "Tenshin chahan" that is prepared by putting an for Tenshin-han on top of omuchahan.
Also, certain Chinese restaurants serve "Tenshin chahan" that is prepared by pouring the gelee for Tenshin-han on the top of omuchahan.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 「芙蓉蟹（肉）」（蟹玉）の場合は、料理名に「蟹」が入っているので、蟹肉は必須である。
sen.e: In the case of "Fu Rong Xie (rou)" (fried crab meat with egg white), because the name of the dish includes the character meaning "crab", crab meat is indispensable.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: Crab meat is indispensable in the case of "Fu Rong Xie (rou)" (fried crab meat with egg white), because the name of the dish includes the character for "crab."
Crab meat is indispensable in the case of 'Fu Rong Xie (rou)' (fried crab meat with egg white), because the name of the dish includes the character for 'crab.'
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 天津飯には「蟹」の字が入っていないので、蟹肉を使わず、エビ、カニカマ、蒲鉾、ミンチ肉などで代用されている場合もある。
sen.e: As Tenshin-han does not include the character for "crab," prawn, kanikama (imitation crab meat), kamaboko (boiled fish paste) or minced meat are sometimes used instead of crab meat.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: As Tenshin-han does not include the character for "crab," prawn, kanikama (imitation crab meat), kamaboko (boiled fish paste) or minced meat are sometimes used instead of crab meat.
As Tenshin-han does not include the character for 'crab,' prawn, imitation crab meat, boiled fish paste or minced meat are sometimes used instead of crab meat.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。
